name: Genius Loci (Richard Sherriff)
description:
Genius Loci is an archaeology game set in the British Countryside.

Genius Loci was created for Global Game Jam 2021. It is playable from start to finish but does not represent a complete product.

=== How To Play ===

Dig up artefacts with the aim of finding the lost Roman temple you suspect to be here! The local villagers will tell you everything they've heard about artefacts being found.

Movement - Arrow Keys
Dig - D

Move into the red exclamation points to get hints on where to dig and find artefacts.
Each artefact will give you a clue to a big discovery.
Artefacts and exclamation points will repeat their clue if you move into them again.
